version_description:
-Added a very slight recoil to all weapons
-Added option to resize controls
-Added Loot button to the deathscreen
-Impoved spawn system
-Improved balancing and time to kill on all wepons
-Improved SA78 looks
-Improved ammo count for all weapons
-Fixed iOS high framerate option
-Fixed severe bx exploit (thanks Arachne)
-Fixed Jewellery Raid exploit (thanks bluesparks)
-Fixed FFA scoreboard sorting and removed assists
-Fixed War Zone exploit
-Fixed Sweeper spread when aiming

-Added a very slight recoil to all weapons
-Added option to resize controls
-Added Loot button to the deathscreen
-Impoved spawn system
-Improved balancing and time to kill on all wepons
-Improved SA78 looks
-Improved ammo count for all weapons
-Fixed iOS high framerate option
-Fixed severe bx exploit (thanks Arachne)
-Fixed Jewellery Raid exploit (thanks bluesparks)
-Fixed FFA scoreboard sorting and removed assists
-Fixed War Zone exploit
-Fixed Sweeper spread when aiming

-Added a very slight recoil to all weapons
-Added option to resize controls
-Added Loot button to the deathscreen
-Impoved spawn system
-Improved balancing and time to kill on all wepons
-Improved SA78 looks
-Improved ammo count for all weapons
-Fixed iOS high framerate option
-Fixed severe bx exploit (thanks Arachne)
-Fixed Jewellery Raid exploit (thanks bluesparks)
-Fixed FFA scoreboard sorting and removed assists
-Fixed War Zone exploit
-Fixed Sweeper spread when aiming

-Added a new map with a Western theme!
-Added two new Western characters
-Added 10 new levels, level cap is now 40
-Added two characters and four weapons which were previously locked
-Added a small amount of visual recoil to all weapons
-Added a started pack
-Added basic security checks as a start on securing the game
-Improved City Park layout
-Improved weapon sounds can now be heard across the map
-Improved map pool now considers game version
-Improved store now considers game version
-Fixed a bug where your SPM showed the wrong value
-Fixed glitch where you could get stuck on War Zone (thx Lezzy)
-Updated Photon

-Added a new map with a Western theme!
-Added two new Western characters
-Added 10 new levels, level cap is now 40
-Added two characters and four weapons which were previously locked
-Added a small amount of visual recoil to all weapons
-Added a started pack
-Added basic security checks as a start on securing the game
-Improved City Park layout
-Improved weapon sounds can now be heard across the map
-Improved map pool now considers game version
-Improved store now considers game version
-Fixed a bug where your SPM showed the wrong value
-Fixed glitch where you could get stuck on War Zone (thx Lezzy)
-Updated Photon

-Added a new map with a Western theme!
-Added two new Western characters
-Added 10 new levels, level cap is now 40
-Added two characters and four weapons which were previously locked
-Added a small amount of visual recoil to all weapons
-Added a started pack
-Added basic security checks as a start on securing the game
-Improved City Park layout
-Improved weapon sounds can now be heard across the map
-Improved map pool now considers game version
-Improved store now considers game version
-Fixed a bug where your SPM showed the wrong value
-Fixed glitch where you could get stuck on War Zone (thx Lezzy)
-Updated Photon

Added the ability to report other players
Added several hidden security features
Improved netcode performance in several ways
Improved and simplified damage dropoff
Improved player movement when hitting your head
Improved (slightly) server browser looks
Fixed an issue where the death cam would clip the roof
Fixed not cancelling aiming when trying to reload when empty
Fixed Mining Mayhem exploit (thanks Foxy)
Fixed iOS crashing issues (thanks Arachne, Lezzy)
Fixed started pack being available after purchase
Fixed lighting bug on Murky Market
Fixed Nano magazine floating bug when killed
Fixed an issue with adding friend button disappearing (thanks Lezzy)

Added the ability to report other players
Added several hidden security features
Improved netcode performance in several ways
Improved and simplified damage dropoff
Improved player movement when hitting your head
Improved (slightly) server browser looks
Fixed an issue where the death cam would clip the roof
Fixed not cancelling aiming when trying to reload when empty
Fixed Mining Mayhem exploit (thanks Foxy)
Fixed iOS crashing issues (thanks Arachne, Lezzy)
Fixed started pack being available after purchase
Fixed lighting bug on Murky Market
Fixed Nano magazine floating bug when killed
Fixed an issue with adding friend button disappearing (thanks Lezzy)

Added top 30 leaderboards for wins & eliminations
Added live health display for your killer
Improved app security
Improved automatic reporting
Improved performance for high DPI devices
Improved netcode performance
Improved health value display
Fixed "teleportation" lag
Fixed several issues with the controls (control layout will reset)
Fixed killfeed showing kills without names
Fixed weapon suddenly appearing on the killcam
Fixed Murky Market collision exploit
Fixed scoreboard not showing until score updates
Fixed regen skins being revived on grenade kills

Added top 30 leaderboards for wins & eliminations
Added live health display for your killer
Improved app security
Improved automatic reporting
Improved performance for high DPI devices
Improved netcode performance
Improved health value display
Fixed "teleportation" lag
Fixed several issues with the controls (control layout will reset)
Fixed killfeed showing kills without names
Fixed weapon suddenly appearing on the killcam
Fixed Murky Market collision exploit
Fixed scoreboard not showing until score updates
Fixed regen skins being revived on grenade kills

Added host migration to combat network lag
Added update notice if you're playing on an old version
Added different hitmarkers for head and body shots
Added FOV setting
Added system info (time, connection, battery)
Added partial Swedish language
Improved build size
Improved player hit boxes
Improved game security
Fixed aiming cancelling when out of ammo
Fixed War Zone exploit (thanks Lezzy)
Fixed hit sound on friendly grenade hits (thanks Lezzy)

Added host migration to combat network lag
Added update notice if you're playing on an old version
Added different hitmarkers for head and body shots
Added FOV setting
Added system info (time, connection, battery)
Added partial Swedish language
Improved build size
Improved player hit boxes
Improved game security
Fixed aiming cancelling when out of ammo
Fixed War Zone exploit (thanks Lezzy)
Fixed hit sound on friendly grenade hits (thanks Lezzy)

Added a new exciting weapon with new mechanics!
Added US, EU and ASIA regions to combat lag!
Added the ability to select your region
Added Xmas theme together with an explosive gift!
Added button for weapon switching (enable it in the settings)
Added volumetric lights to Murky Market and Syn Corp.
Added visible player ID's to make it easier to deal with cheaters
Improved jumping to avoid abuse
Improved reporting system
Improved Free For All with 8 players
Fixed (attempted) an issue where you couldn't spawn
Fixed server browser scrolling not working (thanks PUC Allawi)
Fixed false flying reports (thanks SkillsESR)

Added a new exciting weapon with new mechanics!
Added US, EU and ASIA regions to combat lag!
Added the ability to select your region
Added Xmas theme together with an explosive gift!
Added button for weapon switching (enable it in the settings)
Added volumetric lights to Murky Market and Syn Corp.
Added visible player ID's to make it easier to deal with cheaters
Improved jumping to avoid abuse
Improved reporting system
Improved Free For All with 8 players
Fixed (attempted) an issue where you couldn't spawn
Fixed server browser scrolling not working (thanks PUC Allawi)
Fixed false flying reports (thanks SkillsESR)

Added killstreak emblems (thanks Lezzy)
Added sniper sensitivity
Added fast graphics option
Added Dutch translation (thanks Lezzy)
Added headshots to personal killfeed
Improved hit sound
Improved M24 balancing
Improved controls settings layout
Fixed impact grenade not doing damage (thanks Casper, Lezzy)
Fixed a bunch of occlusion bugs and map exploits (thanks FAKEZ, TrulyPanda)
Updated Unity

Added bots that will fill in for missing players!
Added simple matchmaking!
Added an optional profanity filter (on by default)
Added a HUD opacity slider
Improved sensitivity to 100 steps
Improved sensitivity range
Improved sniper bullet penetrations
Fixed City Park colliders

Fixed SPM bug

Fixed unfair counting of wins/losses

Added setting to hide the chat
Improved bots balancing
Improved profanity filter
Fixed SPM bug

Added a cancel button for snipers when scoped in
Added a new headshot sound
Added the ability to switch teams in custom matches
Improved custom matches by disabling inactivity check
Improved and nerfed bots in multiple ways
Switched to a week based version numbering system
Bug fixes and security improvements

Battle Royale for Danger Close is live!

Try out 5 brand new weapons, our largest map yet and several new mechanics! Will you be the last player standing?

Added a new and highly improved 3D menu!
Improved sights for M4 & Electron
Fixed Fragger & Destroyer weapon positioning

Added resolution setting
Improved BR ammo handling when picking up weapons
Improved BR melee system
Improved BR pregame area with more loot
Fixed loot not spawning in BR
Fixed not being able to jump through windows in BR
Fixed bots stuttering when parachuting in BR
Fixed BR spaceship stuttering & getting stuck
Fixed sensitivity being affected by resolution
Fixed default names being checked by profanity filter

Battle Royale for Danger Close is live!

Try out 5 brand new weapons, our largest map yet and several new mechanics! Will you be the last player standing?

Added a slight sway when aiming
Added hipfire movement accuracy penalty
Improved crosshair with a more dynamic feel
Improved sniper balancing by limiting movement speed when scoped in
Improved sniper balancing by adding scope sway
Improved gameplay by nerfing jumping
Improved movement speed by slightly increasing it
Improved BR circle visuals
Fixed circle stuttering when not host
Fixed not being able to open action menu on teammates
Updated Unity to 2019.1.7

Battle Royale for Danger Close is live!

Try out 5 brand new weapons, our largest map yet and several new mechanics! Will you be the last player standing?

Added a new improved animation system which also shows reload, throwing and melee animations
Improved sights for MP40, STG, AK, Thompson, MG42, Nano and Blitz
Improved game size with a 5% decrease
Improved BR performance
Updated Unity to 2019.1.8

Added a cancel button for snipers when scoped in

Improved custom matches by disabling inactivity check
Improved and nerfed bots in multiple ways

Bug fixes and security improvements

Battle Royale for Danger Close is live!

Try out 5 brand new weapons, our largest map yet and several new mechanics! Will you be the last player standing?

Added a proper FPS & ping counter (Enable by setting System Info to “Full”)
Added the ability for admins to give hourly bans and kick players
Improved FOV setting by increasing the max to 110
Improved sensitivity setting (sensitivity will reset)
Improved profanity/spam filter
Improved War Zone and Murky Market performance
Updated Unity/Backend/Networking

Battle Royale for Danger Close is live!

Try out 5 brand new weapons, our largest map yet and several new mechanics! Will you be the last player standing?

Added BR wins to stats screen
Improved player sprint animation to look slightly more up
Improved player animations to point the weapon more accurately
Improved sights for M5K, PPSh, BAR, M24, AWM & .50 Cal
Fixed game stopping when a paused player takes over as master client
Fixed aiming not cancelling when out of ammo and pressing reload
Fixed bots not one handing weapons
Fixed stutter caused by network debugging messages
Optimised game size by >40%
Optimised light beams on Murky Market and Syn Corp.

Battle Royale for Danger Close is live!

Try out 5 brand new weapons, our largest map yet and several new mechanics! Will you be the last player standing?

Added a new item shop
Added 23 new outfits
Added 12 new melee weapons
Added a new balanced and cosmetic only melee system
Added a new inventory system
Added a new perk system
Added a new Gx store with lower prices
Added EU region
Added link to Facebook page
Removed character abilities
Improved default outfits
Improved health regeneration speed by increasing it
Improved shotgun crosshair
Improved BR weapon pickup time by increasing it
Fixed (attempted) amount of bots spawned/killed not being synced across clients
Fixed (attempted) some players not being able to move
Fixed profanity filter vulnerability
Fixed SWAT, Blackbeard & Skelly Bro weapon positioning
Fixed menu stutter caused by server browser
Fixed dropped loot teleporting through roof in BR
Fixed City Park map exploit (thanks s8nn)
Fixed Island Invasion map exploits (thanks s8nn)
Fixed Resistance face anomaly
Fixed Messenger face anomaly

New cosmetic items every day!

Find your look with exciting outfits and melee weapons in our brand new item shop!

Added 24 new outfits to the item shop
Added 8 new melee weapons to the item shop
Improved score UI
Improved security
Fixed sniper kills not counting towards specialist challenge
Updated Unity to 2019.2.6

It's that spooky time of the year!

Celebrate Halloween with ghastly new outfits & melee weapons!

Added 12 new outfits & 14 new melee weapons for Halloween!
Added creator tags - signup in our Discord!
Added in-depth statistics screen
Added killstreak statistic
Improved health & ammo UI
Improved bot outfit variety
Improved spawn delay to 3 from 5 seconds
Improved autofire balancing
Fixed rare instance where players would be invisible
Fixed AK sight (thanks JaskEarth)
